extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Browser and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the browser is affected by retrieving the installed version of Google Chrome or any Chromium-based browser such as Microsoft Edge, Brave, Opera, and Vivaldi.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the browser version below 120.0.6099.129 for Mac/Linux or below 120.0.6099.129/130 for Windows?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Browser
extracted_playbook.description: Update the browser to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: Google Chrome and Chromium-based Browsers Vulnerability
